pullRequest.title: #6386 modified create purchase orders from procurement window process.

commit.message: #6386 modified create purchase orders from procurement window process.

nodes.bodyText:
explicitly log the IDs of the PMM_PurchaseCandidate which you skip here

use Loggables.withLogger(logger, Level.DEBUG) for that, to make sure it's in the async-workpackage-log as well as in the actually logback-log

Already when enqeuting this, make sure to only add PMM_PurchaseCandidates that have a quantity.
it's still possible theat they are zero-ed menwhile, but for that, there will be logging, see below

commit.message: #6386 Made process work like in swing client.
#6385 Modified 'Create Purchase Orders' action to work as customer requested.

nodes.bodyText: alright, good you removed it again; OrderLineAggregation already does that job (i saw it only now 😊 ).
please quickly clean up the imports; i think at least BigDecimal is not needed anymore

commit.message: #6386 Removed unused imports, renamed process & only showing action when there are rows in the view.
